› A global database for hydrological data
Ocean Next participate in the construction of a global database for hydrological data, building on preliminary versions already developed by several french research institutes (such as HydroWeb, Hydrolare, …) Read More ›

› Learning from large-ensemble ocean simulations to better interpret satellite and in-situ ocean data.

About This Site

Ocean Next is a team of scientists and research engineers contributing to fundamental and applied research projects on the oceans and inland waters. The company was founded in 2017 on the initiative of Jacques Verron, oceanographer and expert in data assimilation for operational oceanography More ›
